SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.STOR_ID, T.CD_ID, T.CD_GRP_ID, T.CD_VA, T.RESC_ID, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM DM_RESC_B WHERE STOR_ID = T.STOR_ID AND RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, T.SORT_ORDR, T.USE_YN, T.REGR_UID, T.REG_DT, T.MODR_UID, T.MOD_DT,
FROM DM_CD_D T
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.SORT_ORDR ASC
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
